subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Although Old Dominion has won the Colonial Athletic Associated title to secure a berth to the N.C.A.A. tournament in each of the last 17 seasons, it has not been a major player for years.
snippet: Although Old Dominion has won the Colonial Athletic Associated title to secure a berth to the N.C.A.A. tournament in each of the last 17 seasons, it has not been a major player for years.
